name: 電子學（二）
description:
1.提高學生對電子學的知識，加強理解其基本概念；
2.為學生提供將來學習光電工程、及其他應用科學的基礎。
goals: 瞭解電子元件、儀器的操作原理和相關理論
瞭解電子元件、儀器實際運用
syllabus:
1.CURRENT AND RESISTANCE (自主學習)

2.CONDUCTION OF ELECTRICITY IN SOLIDS (自主學習)

3.Device Structure and Physical Operation of FET

4.Current-Voltage Characteristics of FET

5.MOSFET Circuits at DC

6.CMOS Logic-Gate Circuit

7.Digital Logic Inverters

8.The CMOS Inverter

9. Dynamic operation of the CMOS Inverter

10. Mid-term

11. IC Design Introduction

12\. Pseudo-NMOS logic circuits

13\. Pass-transistor logic circuits

14. Dynamic MOS logic circuits

15\. Latches and Filp-Flops

16\. Semiconductor Memorys

17\. Random-Access Memory

18\. Final
